remarks: The input to this function is a sequence (on ` NN ` ) of homomorphisms ` F ( n ) : R ( n ) --> R ( n + 1 ) ` .  The resulting structure is the direct limit of the direct system so defined.  This function returns the pair ` <. S , G >. ` where ` S ` is the terminal object and ` G ` is a sequence of functions such that ` G ( n ) : R ( n ) --> S ` and ` G ( n ) = F ( n ) o. G ( n + 1 ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
